Class MusicPlayer

public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Provide basic playing of MP3 files via the javazoom library. See http://www.javazoom.net/

Method Detail

playSample

public void playSample(java.lang.String filename)
Play a part of the given file. The method returns once it has finished playing.

Parameters:
filename - The file to be played.

startPlaying

public void startPlaying(java.lang.String filename)
Start playing the given audio file. The method returns once the playing has been started.

Parameters:
filename - The file to be played.

stop

public void stop()
Stops the current song playing
